product_description: Soft and fluffy Filipino bread roll, perfect for breakfast or merienda (snack).
Simple Filipino bread, ideal for sandwiches or dipping in coffee or hot chocolate.
Filipino sticky rice cake wrapped in banana leaves, a traditional delicacy often served with latik (coconut caramel sauce).
Assorted Filipino kakanin (rice cakes) including puto, bibingka, and sapin-sapin. Perfect for sharing or enjoying as a dessert.
Silken tofu topped with arnibal (caramelized sugar syrup) and sago pearls, a popular Filipino street food and breakfast item.
Filipino rice cake made with galapong (rice flour) and topped with salted egg slices and grated coconut. Traditionally enjoyed during Christmas season.
Filipino rice flour and coconut milk-based snack, shaped into cylinders and coated with toasted rice flour. A delicious and simple treat.
Locally sourced Filipino coffee beans, roasted to perfection. Enjoy a cup of aromatic and flavorful coffee at home.
